title: Setup Guide PL/I & CICS
description: Learn how to set up your development environment for PL/I and CICS.

theory.content:
Welcome to the Setup Guide for PL/I and CICS.

This guide will walk you through setting up your development environment, installing necessary tools, and configuring your system to work with PL/I and CICS.

Proper setup is essential for a smooth learning experience.

exercise.instructions: Write a simple PL/I program to verify your setup is working correctly.
exercise.hint: Create a basic 'Hello World' program using PROC OPTIONS(MAIN).

questions.question: What is the first step in setting up PL/I?
